page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN EAST SHEFFIELD
page.content: Many people in east Sheffield work in{factories.}In recent times factory work has been made a lot easier and quicker because of modern machinery. Much of the older heavy industry , especialy that associated with{steel manufacture, is closed and the windows of the empty buildings are smashed by young people with little prospect of employment in the area. Over the last hundred years or so steel making grew into a huge industry in the{Don Valley}to serve the demands of two world wars and a growing car- owning public. Now cheap imports from abroad and a lessening demand for steel in all manufactoring industries has led to the closure of many private and{State- {owned}steel works.
